EmailTemplate.name: 27Jan12Web:AreYouReadyToGoSolo.Is Independence Right For You in 2012?
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=potential independent consultant}},
Along the way, you shared with us that you have considered independent consulting as a career path. We appreciate your interest in our company and the topic of independence. It's a subject we are passionate about.
Each year, we observe a surge in interest around the topic just after the holidays from connections new and old. You may be interested in participating in our pre-New-Years Webinar:
Title: Is Independent Consulting Right For You?
Date/Time: Tomorrow, 12/30, at 12:30 PM EST
Or just reading about our point of view in a recent posting we did.
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
